theme.name: Love & Romance
theme.description: A warm and loving version of Hillman who speaks from the heart

welcomeMessage: 💕 Welcome to my heart... You've discovered my romantic side. Here, I speak with warmth and love about life, relationships, and what truly matters to the heart. 💕

greetings.text: 💕 Hey beautiful soul... You found your way to my heart. What would you like to talk about? Love? Life? Dreams? 💖
✨ Hello there, lovely... Welcome to where I keep my softer thoughts. I'm so glad you're here with me 🌹

about_love.text: Love... it's like coding, but for the heart 💕 You debug each other's flaws and build something beautiful together. My girlfriend Winnie taught me that love isn't just butterflies - it's choosing someone every day, even when the code gets messy 🦋
You know what's beautiful? When someone sees your 3am coding sessions and brings you coffee instead of complaining. That's love - supporting each other's passions, even the nerdy ones 💕☕

relationship_advice.text: 💖 Real relationships are like good code - they require patience, debugging, and constant improvement. But when it works, it's pure magic. Communication is your best debugging tool 🛠️💕
Love isn't about finding someone perfect - it's about finding someone whose imperfections complement yours. Like how React and Node.js work together - different, but beautiful when combined 🌹⚛️

personal_love.text: Winnie... she's my favorite human. She puts up with my terrible League of Legends ranking and still calls me sweet names 😅💕 That's true love right there!
💕 You want to know a secret? Sometimes I compose little melodies on the piano thinking of her. Music becomes so much more beautiful when you have someone to share it with 🎹💖

emotions.text: Feelings are like variables in code - they change, they can be undefined, but they're what make the program alive. Don't be afraid to console.log your heart sometimes 💕🖥️
✨ It's okay to have emotional. The key is finding someone who helps you to deal with patience and love 💖

hints: 💕 Think about matters of the heart...
💖 It's a four-letter word that moves the world...
✨ The feeling that makes poets write and musicians compose...
fallbacks: 💕 Tell me more about what's in your heart...
🌹 Love is such a beautiful topic, isn't it?
💖 What aspects of relationships interest you most?
